channel.title: How can i make people with { } @&^#$*#%& not log in to server?
channel.description:
How can i make it so if people have names with the following letters in it not loggin? ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ + ~ ` = - \ | } { : ; " ' ? / > < . ,
You will get a little something for your help. thanks

item.title: How can i make people with { } @&^#$*#%& not log in to server?
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

ok it says message but it dont dc you.

Mine dcs them and bans [code]if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.endsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith(" ") || playerName.startsWith(" ")|| playerName.contains(";") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("(") || playerName.contains(")") || playerName.contains("§") || playerName.contains("¿") || playerName.contains("ß") || playerName.contains("ƒ") || playerName.contains("‡") || playerName.contains("£") || playerName.contains("¶") || playerName.contains("Æ") || playerName.contains("Þ") || playerName.contains("†") || playerName.contains("¢") || playerName.contains("®") || playerName.contains("¥") || playerName.contains("©") || playerName.contains("µ") || playerName.contains("þ") || playerName.contains("æ") || playerName.contains("™") || playerName.contains("¤") || playerName.contains("°") || playerName.contains("Ø") || playerName.contains("€") || playerName.contains("Œ") || playerName.contains("œ") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("<")) { disconnected = true; showInterface(99999999); { sendMessage("Come back with a different name"); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } disconnected = true; showInterface(99999999); 
}
}[/code]</blockquote>

I used yours and it does this again.

ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1822 [gm]mont$#^ is signing onto server. [gm]mont$#^ failed to logon because they are banned. [gm]mont$#^: character file not found. Could not save for [gm]mont$#^ ClientHandler: Client [gm]mont$#^ disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1823 [gm]mont$#^ is signing onto server. [gm]mont$#^ failed to logon because they are banned. [gm]mont$#^: character file not found. Could not save for [gm]mont$#^ ClientHandler: Client [gm]mont$#^ disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1824 [gm]mont$#^ is signing onto server. [gm]mont$#^ failed to logon because they are banned. [gm]mont$#^: character file not found. Could not save for [gm]mont$#^ ClientHandler: Client [gm]mont$#^ disconnected.

Read full topic

item.source: How can i make people with { } @&^#$*#%& not log in to server?

item.title: How can i make people with { } @&^#$*#%& not log in to server?
item.dc:creator: @I_can_3_hit I can 3 hit
item.description:
@I_can_3_hit wrote:

Mine dcs them and bans
[code]if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") ||
playerName.endsWith(" “) || playerName.endsWith(” “) || playerName.endsWith(” “) || playerName.endsWith(” “) || playerName.startsWith(” “) || playerName.startsWith(” “) || playerName.startsWith(” “) || playerName.startsWith(” “)||
playerName.contains(”;") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("]") ||
playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("(") || playerName.contains(")") ||
playerName.contains("§") || playerName.contains("¿") || playerName.contains(“ß”) ||
playerName.contains(“ƒ”) || playerName.contains("‡") || playerName.contains(“£”) ||
playerName.contains("¶") || playerName.contains(“Æ”) || playerName.contains(“Þ”) ||
playerName.contains("†") || playerName.contains(“¢”) || playerName.contains(“®”) ||
playerName.contains(“¥”) || playerName.contains(“©”) || playerName.contains(“µ”) ||
playerName.contains(“þ”) || playerName.contains(“æ”) || playerName.contains(“™”) ||
playerName.contains(“¤”) || playerName.contains(“°”) || playerName.contains(“Ø”) ||
playerName.contains(“€”) || playerName.contains(“Œ”) || playerName.contains(“œ”) || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") ||
playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") ||
playerName.contains(“SYI”) || playerName.contains("<"))
{
disconnected = true;
showInterface(99999999); {
sendMessage(“Come back with a different name”);
if(checkbannedusers() != 5) {
appendToBanned(playerName);
checkbannedusers();
}
disconnected = true;
showInterface(99999999);

}
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make people with { } @&^#$*#%& not log in to server?

item.title: How can i make people with { } @&^#$*#%& not log in to server?
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“montalvom, post:9, topic:151050”][quote author=cwg452003 link=topic=206660.msg1817326#msg1817326 date=1192167195]
add this

[code] if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") ||
playerName.endsWith(" “) || playerName.endsWith(” “) || playerName.endsWith(” “) || playerName.endsWith(” “) || playerName.startsWith(” “) || playerName.startsWith(” “) || playerName.startsWith(” “) || playerName.startsWith(” “)||
playerName.contains(”;") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("]") ||
playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("(") || playerName.contains(")") ||
playerName.contains("§") || playerName.contains("¿") || playerName.contains(“ß”) ||
playerName.contains(“”) || playerName.contains(“”) || playerName.contains(“£”) ||
playerName.contains("¶") || playerName.contains(“Æ”) || playerName.contains(“Þ”) ||
playerName.contains(“”) || playerName.contains(“¢”) || playerName.contains(“®”) ||
playerName.contains(“¥”) || playerName.contains(“©”) || playerName.contains(“µ”) ||
playerName.contains(“þ”) || playerName.contains(“æ”) || playerName.contains(“”) ||
playerName.contains(“¤”) || playerName.contains(“°”) || playerName.contains(“Ø”) ||
playerName.contains(“”) || playerName.contains(“”) || playerName.contains(“”) || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") ||
playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") ||
playerName.contains(“SYI”) || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains(“mod”) || playerName.contains(“admin”) || playerName.contains(“owner”) || playerName.contains(“Admin”))
{
if(kickTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“Come back with a different name”);
if(checkbannedusers() != 5) {
appendToBanned(playerName);
checkbannedusers();
}
kickTimer = 20;

}
}

[/code]
under

public boolean process()

It kicks anyone with those symbols or names.
[/quote]

can you tell me voids for kicktimer?[/quote]

…

declare the int kickTimer on top of the process.

Read full topic

playerName.contains(“¥”) || playerName.contains(“©”) || playerName.contains(“µ”) ||
playerName.contains(“þ”) || playerName.contains(“æ”) || playerName.contains(“™”) ||
playerName.contains(“¤”) || playerName.contains(“°”) || playerName.contains(“Ø”) ||
playerName.contains(“€”) || playerName.contains(“Œ”) || playerName.contains(“œ”) || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") ||
playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") ||
playerName.contains(“SYI”) || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains(“mod”) || playerName.contains(“admin”) || playerName.contains(“owner”) || playerName.contains(“Admin”))
{

}

[/code]

item.title: How can i make people with { } @&^#$*#%& not log in to server?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

add this

[code] if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") ||
playerName.endsWith(" “) || playerName.endsWith(” “) || playerName.endsWith(” “) || playerName.endsWith(” “) || playerName.startsWith(” “) || playerName.startsWith(” “) || playerName.startsWith(” “) || playerName.startsWith(” “)||
playerName.contains(”;") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("]") ||
playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("(") || playerName.contains(")") ||
playerName.contains("§") || playerName.contains("¿") || playerName.contains(“ß”) ||
playerName.contains(“ƒ”) || playerName.contains("‡") || playerName.contains(“£”) ||
playerName.contains("¶") || playerName.contains(“Æ”) || playerName.contains(“Þ”) ||
playerName.contains("†") || playerName.contains(“¢”) || playerName.contains(“®”) ||
playerName.contains(“¥”) || playerName.contains(“©”) || playerName.contains(“µ”) ||
playerName.contains(“þ”) || playerName.contains(“æ”) || playerName.contains(“™”) ||
playerName.contains(“¤”) || playerName.contains(“°”) || playerName.contains(“Ø”) ||
playerName.contains(“€”) || playerName.contains(“Œ”) || playerName.contains(“œ”) || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") ||
playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") ||
playerName.contains(“SYI”) || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains(“mod”) || playerName.contains(“admin”) || playerName.contains(“owner”) || playerName.contains(“Admin”))
{
if(kickTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“Come back with a different name”);
if(checkbannedusers() != 5) {
appendToBanned(playerName);
checkbannedusers();
}
kickTimer = 20;

}
}

[/code]
under

public boolean process()

It kicks anyone with those symbols or names.
